languages.text: Контроль над священной машиной мог облегчить наше дальнейшее наступление. Был дан приказ — десантироваться на мостик крейсера и сопроводить технопровидцев к главному когитатору.

traits.locale_text: Если бы у нас вышло заполучить эту махину себе, прорваться к Машинному храму не составило бы труда. Был дан приказ — десантироваться на мостик крейсера и сопроводить технопровидцев к главному когитатору.

languages.text: Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the Enginseers to the main cogitator.
languages.original_text: Контроль над священной машиной мог облегчить наше дальнейшее наступление. Был дан приказ — десантироваться на мостик крейсера и сопроводить технопровидцев к главному когитатору.

traits.locale_text: Having the sacred machine on our side could have gave our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the enginseers to the main cogitator.
Having the sacred machine on our side could have gave our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the enginseers to the main cogitator.
Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the enginseers to the main cogitator.
Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the enginseers to the main cogitator.
Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the Enginseers to the main cogitator.
Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the Enginseers to the main cogitator.

languages.text: 如果能从敌人手中夺回这艘神圣的战舰，这肯定会为我们接下来的攻击带来巨大的优势。我们收到了舰长大人的命令，要求让登舰部队抵达那艘巡洋舰的舰桥，同时护送引擎先知前往主沉思者处。
languages.original_text: Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the Enginseers to the main cogitator.

traits.locale_text: 如果能从敌人手中夺回这艘神圣的战舰，这肯定会为我们接下来的攻击带来巨大的优势。我们收到了舰长大人的命令，要求让登舰部队抵达那艘巡洋舰的舰桥，同时护送引擎先知前往主思考器处。

languages.text: Notre offensive aurait un avantage certain avec la machine sacrée de notre côté. Nous avons donc reçu l'ordre d'envoyer une force terrestre sur la passerelle du croiseur et d'escorter les technaugures jusqu'à son cogitateur principal.
languages.original_text: Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the Enginseers to the main cogitator.

traits.locale_text: Notre offensive aurait un avantage certain avec la machine sacrée de notre côté. Nous avons donc reçu l'ordre d'envoyer une force terrestre sur la passerelle du croiseur et d'escorter les technaugures jusqu'à son cogitateur principal.

languages.text: 聖なる機械を手に入れれば我々の攻勢を大きく有利にすることができた。上陸部隊を巡洋艦のブリッジに向かわせ、機関整備師たちを主考算機まで護衛するよう命じられた。
languages.original_text: Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the Enginseers to the main cogitator.

traits.locale_text: 聖なる機械を手に入れれば我々の攻勢を大きく有利にすることができた。上陸部隊を巡洋艦のブリッジに向かわせ、機関整備師たちを主考算機まで護衛するよう命じられた。

languages.text: Tener la sagrada máquina de nuestra parte daría a nuestras fuerzas una ventaja considerable. Nuestras órdenes eran llevar una fuerza de desembarco al puente del crucero y escoltar a los visioingenieros al cogitador central.
languages.original_text: Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the Enginseers to the main cogitator.

traits.locale_text: Tener la sagrada máquina de nuestra parte daría a nuestras fuerzas una ventaja considerable. Nuestras órdenes eran llevar una fuerza de desembarco al puente del crucero y escoltar a los visioingenieros al cogitador central.

languages.text: Die heilige Maschine auf unserer Seite zu haben, hätte unserer Offensive einen großen Vorteil verleihen können. Unser Befehl lautete, mit einem Landetrupp auf die Brücke des Kreuzers vorzudringen und die Maschinenseher zum Hauptcogitator zu eskortieren.
languages.original_text: Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the Enginseers to the main cogitator.

traits.locale_text: Die heilige Maschine auf unserer Seite zu haben, hätte unserer Offensive einen großen Vorteil verleihen können. Unser Befehl lautete, mit einem Landetrupp auf die Brücke des Kreuzers vorzudringen und die Maschinenseher zum Hauptcogitator zu eskortieren.

languages.text: Kutsal makinenin bizim safımızda olması, saldırı saflarımıza muazzam bir avantaj sağlayacaktı. Lord Kaptan, geminin köprüsüne iniş yapıp Mühedyumlara ana kavramsayara kadar eşlik edecek bir müfreze hazırlanmasını buyurdu.
languages.original_text: Having the sacred machine on our side could have given our offensive a sizeable edge. Our orders were to get a landing force to the cruiser's bridge and escort the Enginseers to the main cogitator.
